009package Ch11_CirclesAndEllipses;
010
011import static java.lang.Math.PI;
012
013import java.awt.Color;
014import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
015import java.util.Random;
016
017import ij.ImagePlus;
018import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
019import ij.gui.NewImage;
020import ij.gui.Overlay;
021import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.project.ConfocalConicEllipseProjector;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.project.EllipseProjector;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.project.OrthogonalEllipseProjector;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
029
030/**
031 * <p>
032 * This plugin creates a new image with an ellipse and a set of random points.
033 * For each point, the closest (contact) point on the ellipse is
034 * calculated and a connecting line is drawn to a vector overlay.
035 * Two closest-point algorithms are available:
036 * </p>
037 * <ol>
038 * <li> orthogonal, exact closest point (iterative) and </li>
039 * <li> approximate confocal conic closest point estimation (non-iterative).</li>
040 * </ol>
041 * 
042 * @author WB
043 *
044 */
045public class Ellipse_Closest_Points implements PlugIn {
046        
047        private static int W = 400;
048        private static int H = 400;
049        private static int N = 250;
050        private static int Seed = 11;
051        
052        private static final double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
053        private static final Color EllipseColor = Color.green;
054        private static final Color PointColor = Color.blue;
055        private static ClosestPointAlgorithm Algorithm = ClosestPointAlgorithm.Orthogonal;
056        
057        public enum ClosestPointAlgorithm {
058                Orthogonal, ConfocalConics
059        }
060        
061        @Override
062        public void run(String arg) {
063                
064                if (!runDialog()) {
065                        return;
066                }
067                
068                //GeometricEllipse realEllipse = new GeometricEllipse(170, 120, 200, 190, PI/7);                // example 1
069                GeometricEllipse realEllipse = new GeometricEllipse(1100, 120, 25, 1200, PI/2 + 0.2);   // example 2
070                
071                String title = this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " (" + Algorithm.toString() + ")";
072                ImagePlus im = NewImage.createByteImage(title, W, H, 1, NewImage.FILL_WHITE);
073                
074                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
075                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
076                
077                ColoredStroke ellipseStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, EllipseColor);
078                ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, PointColor);
079                ola.addShapes(realEllipse.getShapes(), ellipseStroke);
080                
081                EllipseProjector projector = null;
082                switch (Algorithm) {
083                case Orthogonal:
084                        projector = new OrthogonalEllipseProjector(realEllipse);
085                        break;
086                case ConfocalConics:
087                        projector = new ConfocalConicEllipseProjector(realEllipse);
088                        break;
089                }
090                
091                Random rd = new Random(Seed);
092
093                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
094                        Pnt2d p = Pnt2d.from(W * rd.nextDouble(), H* rd.nextDouble());
095                        Pnt2d p0 = projector.project(p);
096                        // draw connecting line:
097                        Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
098                        path.moveTo(p.getX(), p.getY());
099                        path.lineTo(p0.getX(), p0.getY());
100                        ola.addShape(path);
101                        // draw point p:
102                        ola.addShape(p.getShape(), pointStroke);
103                }
104                
105                im.setOverlay(oly);
106                im.show();
107        }
108
109        private boolean runDialog() {
110                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
111                gd.addNumericField("number of random points", N, 0);
112                gd.addNumericField("random seed", Seed, 0);
113                gd.addEnumChoice("closest-point method", Algorithm);
114                
115                gd.showDialog();
116                if (gd.wasCanceled())
117                        return false;
118                
119                N = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
120                Seed = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
121                Algorithm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(ClosestPointAlgorithm.class);
122                
123                return true;
124        }
125        
126}
